Sort By
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../models/product'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent implements OnInit { view: 'grid' | 'list' = 'list'; sortby: 'default' | 'htl' | 'lth' = 'default'; products: Product[] = []; ngOnInit(): void { } }
